subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Joji Kato handed Jeremy Wotherspoon his first defeat this season at 500 meters in World Cup speedskating in Inzell, Germany. Kato was timed in 35.48 in poor weather to beat Wotherspoon’s 35.61, snapping Wotherspoon streak of six World Cup wins this season..
